definition: abbr. for 書經|书经[Shu1 jing1]
France/French/abbr. for 法國|法国[Fa3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Fa4]
law/method/way/to emulate/(Buddhism) dharma/(abbr. for 法家[Fa3 jia1]) the Legalists/(physics) farad (abbr. for 法拉[fa3 la1])

sentences.english: In this age of the keyboard , some people seem to think handwriting lessons are on the way out.
sentences.chinese: 在这个键盘的年代，有人似乎认为书法课即将灭亡。

sentences.english: Calligraphy has practically become a lost art in today‘s computer society.
sentences.chinese: 在今天的电脑时代，书法艺术差不多要消亡了。

sentences.english: Chinese artists believe that calligraphy and painting share one common source.
sentences.chinese: 国画家们相信书法和绘画是相通的。

sentences.english: Shen Yinmo is closely related to the revival of modern Chinese calligraphic culture.
sentences.chinese: 沈尹默与现代中国书法文化复兴是紧密相联的。

sentences.english: Learn from tradition calligraphy but not limited by it, this is the principles of Wang Delin's calligraphy.
sentences.chinese: 师古不泥古，这是王德林研习书法的宗旨。

sentences.english: When I got up, she has already finished her handwriting task and school assignment.
sentences.chinese: 当我起来的时候，她已经完成了书法作业和暑假作业。

sentences.english: Li Shimin regarded Wang's calligraphy work as perfect.
sentences.chinese: 李世民对王羲之书法认为已经达到了“尽善尽美”。

sentences.english: Conventionally, China’s painting is directly connecting with calligraphy.
sentences.chinese: 通常，中国的绘画与书法有着直接的联系。

sentences.english: I'd like to write a scroll for the program, Happy China.
sentences.chinese: 那我今天就为《快乐中国》栏目写一卷书法。

sentences.english: In fact, Yangjiang Group also used calligraphy as the medium of artistic practice.
sentences.chinese: 事实上，阳江组也是以书法为媒介来进行艺术实践的。

sentences.english: Susannah won the calligraphy prize when she was at school.
sentences.chinese: 苏珊娜上学时赢得了书法奖。

sentences.english: Students in higher grades should also learn to appreciate the works of ancient calligraphers.
sentences.chinese: 高年级学生还应学会欣赏古代书法家的作品。

sentences.english: The third section describes Chu Lu-ching calligraphy teaching methods.
sentences.chinese: 第三部分介绍朱履贞的书法教学方法。

sentences.english: Mr Wang Delin was obsessed with calligraphy from he began studying in Xi'an institute of geological.
sentences.chinese: 王德林先生早在西安地质学院求学时就迷恋上了书法。

sentences.english: Chinese painting has an outstanding characteristic, that is to say, poetry or calligraphy is inscribed on paintings.
sentences.chinese: 中国画有一个显著的特色，就是把诗或书法题在画上。

definition: a rubbing from a stone inscription
generic term for hard writing instruments such as quill pens, fountain pens, ball pens and pencils, as opposed to writing brushes
